WorkItem.Description:
a major bug is reported by Boris Hurinek.
NetOffice creates the eventbridge for an object always with the lowest available EventInterface.
as outcome you got an exception while add an event trigger or your specific event was not fired in actual office versions.
The problem is located in SinkHelper.cs in LateBindingApi.Core.dll 
next release with fixed issue comes in 2-3 days. 
the error is resolved in latest source code: NetOffice\Source\Net v2.0 v3.0 v3.5 as hotfix
WorkItem.Summary: Exception while add Event Trigger in actual Office Versions

Comments.Message:
bug terminated
new release 1.1 available
issue closed

*have a nice day
